deploy app my-app {
    namespace: "default";
    replicas: 3;
    image: "my-image:latest";
    env {
        ENV_VAR: "value";
    }
    ports {
        http: 8080;
    }
    resources {
        limits {
            memory: "512Mi";
            cpu: "0.5";
        }
        requests {
            memory: "256Mi";
            cpu: "0.25";
        }
    }
    storage {
        volume: "my-volume";
        size: "10Gi";
    }
}
---
service my-service {
    namespace: "default";
    port: 80;
    targetPort: 8080;
}
